Virtual CPA firm spanning several states and canada, serving clients worldwide primarily nonprofit organizations. review fiscal issues, financial reporting and tax reporting

Co-Owner, The Marketplace & Cortez St Emporium; Speaker and  Author "Gifts My Father Gave Me;" LE and FF Charities
October 30, 2013, Sharon was a client of Carolyn’s

I was introduced to the nonprofit (NP) world in 2001. Shortly after becoming the Executive Director of the 100 Club of Arizona I met Carolyn Sechler. The 100 Club has grown exponentially the last decade. I give Carolyn credit for everything I know about NP work. She has been a consultant for many years and our go-to person when we face nonprofit law or tax issues. When you are a leader of a nonprofit, you need a person like Carolyn to be your best friend. I highly recommend her services.

summary: We are a CPA firm dedicated to the care and feeding of nonprofit organizations for over 25 years.. we prepare 5+  applications (form 1023, 1023ez  or 1024) each month and support the bookkeeping, accounting, tax, policy and process needs of over 450 nonprofit orgs currently with a team of 26 remote working professionals.. (we act as audit intermediaries but do not perform audits)..love it!Specialties: nonprofit creation, policies, bookkeeping and accounting, strategy, B Corp formation, fiscal sponsorship consulting and more
